name: Test Project
on: push
jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    container: python:3.11
    steps:
      - name: Get Code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - name: install project environment
        run: poetry install
      - name: pre-commit
        run: pre-commit
      - name: tests
        run: pytest -v -s
